trans-unit.source: Provides a container for Windows toolbar objects.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um contêiner para objetos de barra de ferramentas do Windows.

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip is the base class for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStrip é a classe base para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Use ToolStrip and its associated classes in new Windows Forms applications to create toolbars that can have a Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, or custom appearance and behavior, all with or without themes, and with support for overflow and run-time item reordering.
trans-unit.target: Use ToolStrip e suas classes associadas em novos aplicativos de formulários do Windows para criar barras de ferramentas que podem ter um Windows XP, Office, Internet Explorer, ou aparência e comportamento personalizados, todos com ou sem temas e com suportam para o estouro e reordenação de itens em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: ToolStrip controls also offer a rich design-time experience that includes in-place activation and editing, custom layout, and sharing of horizontal or vertical space within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Os controles ToolStrip também oferecem uma experiência avançada de tempo de design que inclui a ativação no local e editar, layout personalizado e o compartilhamento de espaço horizontal ou vertical em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> especificado

trans-unit.source: The ToolStrip class provides many members that manage painting, mouse and keyboard input, and drag-and-drop functionality.
trans-unit.target: A classe ToolStrip fornece muitos membros que gerenciam a pintura e funcionalidade de arrastar e soltar e entrada do teclado e mouse.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class to gain even more control and customizability over the painting and layout style of all ToolStrip controls on a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>de classe com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager>classe para obter mais controle e personalização sobre o estilo de pintura e layout de todos os controles ToolStrip em um Windows Form.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>em todas as orientações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the ToolStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> You can join ToolStrip controls within a specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and merge ToolStrip controls with each other.
trans-unit.target: Estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o controle ToolStrip:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>você pode ingressar em controles ToolStrip dentro de determinado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>e mesclar controles ToolStrip entre si.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripButton>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> rather than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> for Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>para aplicativos de Interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a ToolStrip does not participate in the tab order unless it is absolutely positioned rather than being docked or in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um ToolStrip não participará na ordem de tabulação, a menos que ele está posicionado absolutamente em vez de ser encaixado ou em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost> class to host any other Windows Forms control in a ToolStrip.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>classe para hospedar qualquer outro controle Windows Forms em um ToolStrip.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost>

trans-unit.source: By default, the ToolStrip is double buffered, taking advantage of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> setting.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, ToolStrip é duplo em buffer, aproveitando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>configuração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora ToolStrip substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>controle de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> class with the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>s.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> classe com a matriz especificada de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref>s.

trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether drag-and-drop and item reordering are handled through events that you implement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o arrastar e soltar e reordenação de item são tratados por meio de eventos que você implementar.

trans-unit.source: Set the AllowDrop property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> property to `false` to respond to drag-and-drop behavior you have defined in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> events.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade AllowDrop como `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>propriedade `false` para responder ao comportamento de arrastar e soltar que você definiu no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set AllowDrop to `false` and set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` to cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> class to handle drag-and-drop and item reordering automatically.
trans-unit.target: Definir AllowDrop `false` e defina <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` para fazer com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>classe para lidar com arrastar e soltar e reordenar automaticamente do item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` for two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects to allow dragging of items from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the other.
trans-unit.target: Definir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` de dois <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>objetos para permitir arrastar itens de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para outro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: To enable the default drag-and-drop, the ALT key must be pressed during the drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar o padrão arrastar e soltar, a tecla ALT deve ser pressionada durante a operação de arrastar.

trans-unit.source: Setting both AllowDrop and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A> to `true` throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: Definir ambos os AllowDrop e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>para `true` lança uma exceção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AllowItemReorder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the AllowMerge property to enable multiple-document interface (MDI) children to combine their respective menus in the MDI parent.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade AllowMerge para habilitar os filhos de interface de documentos múltiplos (MDI) combinar seus respectivos menus no pai MDI.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the edges of the container to which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is bound and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as bordas do recipiente ao qual um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> está associado e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: Use the Anchor property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de âncora para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Anchoring a control to its parent control ensures that the anchored edges remain in the same position relative to the edges of the parent control when the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Ancoragem de um controle para seu controle pai garante que as bordas ancoradas na mesma posição em relação as bordas do controle pai quando o controle pai é redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Anchor and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A> properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A âncora e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>propriedades são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only one can be set at a time, and the last one set takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: Somente um pode ser definido em um momento e o último conjunto tem precedência.

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoSize to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is embedded in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> panel, the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> are not translated when you move the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a different panel of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir AutoSize como `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é inserido em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>painel, os limites do que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não são convertidas quando você move a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>um painel diferente de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: To translate the bounds properly, synchronize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged> event, check the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> property, and resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Para converter os limites corretamente, sincronizar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>evento, verifique o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A>propriedade e redimensionamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Orientation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyleChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles, como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a execução de tempo – somente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's AutoSize setting.
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>configuração e do contêiner AutoSize.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se AutoSize é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: - If AutoSize is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se AutoSize é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>escala ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control adjusts its width to closely fit its contents; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle se ajusta sua largura para conter perto de seu conteúdo. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor não dá suporte a cores transparentes, a menos que o `SupportsTransparentBackColor` valor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>é definido como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The BackColor property is an ambient property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade BackColor é uma propriedade de ambiente.

trans-unit.source: An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade de ambiente é uma propriedade de controle que, se não for definido, será recuperado do controle pai.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> will have the same BackColor as its parent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>terá o mesmo BackColor como seu pai <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>por padrão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>

trans-unit.source: For more information about ambient properties, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties> class or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre propriedades de ambiente, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>classe ou o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>Visão geral da classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AmbientProperties>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the binding context for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o contexto de associação para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> returns a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> for all data-bound controls contained by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>retorna um único <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>para todos os controles de associação de dados contidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> keeps all controls that are bound to the same data source synchronized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>mantém todos os controles que estão associados à mesma fonte de dados sincronizada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> specifies the item in the underlying list that all data-bound controls point to.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>Especifica o item na lista subjacente que todos os controles associados a dados apontam para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Position%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> and assigning it to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como criar um novo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>e atribuí-lo para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BindingContext%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether items in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> can be sent to an overflow menu.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens no <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> podem ser enviados a um menu de estouro.

trans-unit.source: Set the CanOverflow property to `true` to send a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> item to an overflow menu when the item's content exceeds the width of the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Defina a propriedade CanOverflow como `true` para enviar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>item a um menu de estouro quando o conteúdo do item excede a largura da barra de ferramentas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there are more overflow items than can be displayed on the form, use the ToolStrip Items Collection Editor to manage this situation.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se houver mais itens de estouro que podem ser exibidas no formulário, use o Editor de coleção de itens de ToolStrip para gerenciar essa situação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to send <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> items to an overflow menu; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para enviar <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> itens a um menu de estouro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o que <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> bordas são encaixados para seu controle pai e determina como um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> é redimensionado com seu pai.

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade Dock para definir como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é redimensionado automaticamente porque seu controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, definindo o encaixe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>faz com que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>para alinhar-se com as bordas esquerdas do controle pai e são redimensionados à medida que o controle pai for redimensionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: Controles são encaixados em sua ordem z, que é a camada visual de controles em um formulário ao longo do eixo z do formulário (profundidade).

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: Um controle pode ser ancorado a uma borda de seu contêiner pai, ou pode ser encaixado para todas as bordas e preencher o contêiner pai.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> control is in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> can be repositioned within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> and across <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controle está em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>podem ser reposicionados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>e em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>s.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The Dock property is ignored, and if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A> property is `false`, the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> grows as items are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Dock é ignorada e se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>é de propriedade `false`, o tamanho do que <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>aumenta à medida que os itens são adicionados à <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Stretch%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> does not participate in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>não participará na ordem de tabulação.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A> and Dock properties are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>e propriedades de encaixe são mutuamente exclusivas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.Anchor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> properties pertain to various aspects of image handling.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>propriedades pertencem aos vários aspectos da manipulação de imagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageAlign%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use images in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> controls by setting these properties directly or by setting the run-time–only ImageList property.
trans-unit.target: Usar imagens em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>controles como definir essas propriedades diretamente ou definindo a propriedade de ImageList run-time – somente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: Image scaling is determined by the interaction of properties in both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, as follows: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> is the scale of the final image as determined by the combination of the image's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> setting and the container's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: Escala da imagem é determinado pela interação de propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>, da seguinte maneira:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A>é a escala da imagem final conforme determinado pela combinação da imagem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A>configuração e o contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>configuração.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.ImageScaling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.ImageScalingSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `true` (the default) and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, no image scaling occurs, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> size is that of the largest item, or a prescribed minimum size.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `true` (o padrão) e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem escala ocorre e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>é de tamanho do maior item ou um determinado tamanho mínimo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A> is `false` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, neither image nor <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> scaling occurs.
trans-unit.target: -Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>é `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>é <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling>, nenhuma imagem nem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>escala ocorre.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemImageScaling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a character is an input character that the item recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um caractere é um caractere de entrada que reconhece o item.

trans-unit.source: The IsInputChar method is called during window message preprocessing to determine whether the given input character should be preprocessed or sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O método IsInputChar é chamado durante o pré-processamento para determinar se o caractere de entrada fornecido deve ser pré-processados ou enviado diretamente para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> de mensagem de janela

trans-unit.source: If the IsInputChar method returns `true`, the specified character is sent directly to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Se o método IsInputChar retorna `true`, o caractere especificado é enviado diretamente a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: However, if the method returns `false`, the character is preprocessed and only sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se o método retornar `false`, o caractere é pré-processados e só é enviado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>se ele não é consumido pela fase de pré-processamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The preprocessing of a character includes checking whether the character is a mnemonic of another control.
trans-unit.target: O pré-processamento de um caractere inclui verificar se o caractere é um mnemônico de outro controle.

trans-unit.source: The character to test.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character should be sent directly to the item and not preprocessed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere deve ser enviado diretamente para o item e não pré-processados; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada regular ou uma chave especial que requer pré-processamento.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave especificada é uma chave de entrada normal; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém todos os itens que pertencem a um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Items collection to retrieve all the items that have been added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, not just the items that are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Usar a coleção de itens para recuperar todos os itens que foram adicionados para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, não apenas os itens que são exibidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: An item remains in the Items collection even if it is an overflow item and is therefore not currently visible.
trans-unit.target: Um item permanece na coleção de itens, mesmo se ele é um item de estouro e, portanto, não é visível no momento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A> property to retrieve only the items that are currently displayed on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>propriedade a recuperar apenas os itens que estão atualmente exibidos em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.DisplayedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: An object of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>, representing all the elements contained by a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto do tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"> </xref>, que representa todos os elementos contidos por um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the layout of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is complete.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o layout do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref> for concluída.

trans-unit.source: When items do not fit within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, an overflow button automatically appears.
trans-unit.target: Quando itens não se ajustarem dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, um botão de estouro é exibida automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property setting determines whether an item appears in the overflow area always, as needed, or never.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade determina se um item é exibido na área de excedentes sempre, conforme o necessário ou nunca.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inspect the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A> property in the LayoutCompleted event to determine whether an item was placed on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, the overflow <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, or if it is not currently showing at all.
trans-unit.target: Inspecione o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>propriedade no evento para determinar se um item foi colocado na principal LayoutCompleted <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, o estouro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, ou se ele não estiver sendo exibido em todos os.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The typical reasons why an item is not displayed are that the item did not fit on the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> property was set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.
trans-unit.target: As razões comuns por que um item não é exibido são que o item não se ajustou no principal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A>propriedade foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemOverflow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Overflow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.target: A alça de dimensionamento não será exibida a menos que você defina também a propriedade LayoutStyle para um dos valores de estouro.

trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade LayoutStyle é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, não será exibida a alça de dimensionamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>

trans-unit.target: The possible values are <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a dialog box key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey method is called during message preprocessing to handle dialog characters such as TAB, RETURN, ESCAPE, and arrow keys.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessDialogKey é chamado durante o pré-processamento de mensagem para lidar com caracteres de caixa de diálogo como guia, RETURN, ESCAPE e teclas de direção.

trans-unit.source: This method is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A> method indicates that the control is not processing the key.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado somente se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>método indica que o controle não está processando a chave.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.IsInputKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProcessDialogKey simply sends the character to the parent control's ProcessDialogKey method, or returns `false` if the control has no parent.
trans-unit.target: O ProcessDialogKey simplesmente envia o caractere para o método de ProcessDialogKey do controle pai ou retorna `false` se o controle não tem nenhum pai.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName> class overrides this method to perform actual processing of dialog box keys.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>classe substitui esse método para executar o processamento real das chaves da caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or an ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado apenas quando o controle é hospedado em um aplicativo Windows Forms ou um controle ActiveX.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a chave foi processada pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: Processa um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: The ProcessMnemonic method is called to give a control the opportunity to process a mnemonic character.
trans-unit.target: O método ProcessMnemonic é chamado para fornecer um controle a oportunidade de processar um caractere mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: This method should determine whether the control is in a state to process mnemonics and whether the given character represents a mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Esse método deve determinar se o controle está em estado de mnemônicos de processo e se o caractere especificado representa um mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se assim, o método deve executar a ação associada ao mnemônico e retorno `true`.

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se não, o método deve retornar `false`.

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method often use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the control's text.
trans-unit.target: As implementações desse método geralmente usam o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para determinar se o caractere especificado corresponde a um mnemônico no texto do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.IsMnemonic%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This default implementation of the ProcessMnemonic method simply returns `false`, to indicate that the control has no mnemonic.
trans-unit.target: Esta implementação padrão do método ProcessMnemonic simplesmente retorna `false`, para indicar que o controle não tem nenhum mnemônico.

trans-unit.source: The character to process.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser processado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere tiver sido processado como um mnemônico pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"></xref> used to customize the look and feel of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref> usadas para personalizar a aparência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the Renderer property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class to customize the look and feel of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> that does not have a window handle.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>classe para personalizar a aparência de qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>que não tem um identificador de janela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.source: To do this, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, assign it to the Renderer property, and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, derive uma classe de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>, atribua a propriedade Renderer e chame o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Invalidate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer>

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer"> </xref> usadas para personalizar a aparência de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Activates a child control.
trans-unit.target: Ativa um controle filho.

trans-unit.source: Optionally specifies the direction in the tab order to select the control from.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, especifica a direção na ordem de tabulação para selecionar o controle de.

trans-unit.source: The `directed` and `forward` parameters are used by container-style controls.
trans-unit.target: O `directed` e `forward` parâmetros são usados por controles de estilo do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: When the `directed` parameter is set to `true`, the `forward` parameter is evaluated to determine which control to select.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `directed` parâmetro está definido como `true`, o `forward` parâmetro é avaliado para determinar qual controle para selecionar.

trans-unit.source: When `forward` is set to `true`, the next control in the tab order is selected; when `false`, the previous control in the tab order is selected.
trans-unit.target: Quando `forward` é definido como `true`, o próximo controle na ordem de tabulação é selecionado; quando `false`, o controle anterior na ordem de tabulação é selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The Select method activates the control if the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName> style bit is set to `true`, it is contained in another control, and all its parent controls are both visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: O método de seleção ativa o controle se o controle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>bit de estilo é definido como `true`, está contida em outro controle e todos os seus controles pai são visíveis e habilitados.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the direction of the control to select; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar a direção do controle para selecionar; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to move forward in the tab order; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to move backward in the tab order.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para Avançar na ordem de tabulação; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para retroceder na ordem de tabulação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
